overview: Ran Fuchs joined MPI as CEO in 2012. Ranâ€™s career spans from managing buy-side-focused business lines at major financial technology firms to heading sell-side credit derivatives trading desks. Prior to coming to MPI, Mr. Fuchs was with fund administrator Citco, where he was Head of Product Development of Citco Transparency Platform, an initiative to provide transparency and reporting to hedge funds and hedge fund investors. Before that, Mr. Fuchs was Global Head of a series of divisions at RiskMetrics (now MSCI, NYSE: MSCI), including Credit Risk and ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance), where he was instrumental in growing the respective business lines to become industry leaders.
